name: New Subjects
description: A small group of intelligent creatures joins your kingdom and submits to your rule, bringing along their knowledge of hidden places within your kingdom. (The exact nature and ancestry of these new subjects is determined by the GM.)

criticalSuccess.msg: Your subjects blend in seamlessly and are welcomed by your citizens, while bringing their own unique contributions to your kingdom. You <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="6">Gain 6 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>, and you gain an additional Region activity during the Activity phase of the next Kingdom turn.

success.msg: Your new subjects are welcomed, and their contributions help in the short term. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="3">Gain 3 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>

failure.msg: Your new subjects endure discrimination from intolerant citizens in your kingdom, but they nonetheless bring willing hands to work and such resources as they possess. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Unrest</button> and <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="gain" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>

criticalFailure.msg: Your new subjects encounter discrimination and xenophobia, and they are eventually driven back into the wild. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d4">Gain 1d4 Unrest</button> and <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="strife" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Strife</button>
